mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into divided (releaseId, inputid, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal) values (#{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inputid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifdivided,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iflatest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update divided set releaseId = #{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputid = #{inputid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algName1 = #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algName2 = #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifDivided = #{ifdivided,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score1 = #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score2 = #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifLatest = #{iflatest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, winAlgname = #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifFinal = #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dividedId = #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dividedId, releaseId, inputid, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal from divided where dividedId = #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select dividedId, releaseId, inputid, algName1, algName2, ifDivided, score1, score2, ifLatest, winAlgname, ifFinal from divided
select * from divided where releaseid = #{releaseid} and algname1=#{algname1} and algname2=#{algname2}
select ifnull(sum(score1),0) as score1 from divided where releaseid = #{releaseid} and algname1=#{algname1} and algname2=#{algname2}
select ifnull(sum(score2),0) as score2 from divided where releaseid = #{releaseid} and algname1=#{algname1} and algname2=#{algname2}
select ifDivided from divided where dividedId = #{dividedid}
select dividedid from divided where winscore is null
select dividedid from divided where score1 is null and ordered is null
select dividedid from divided where score2 is null and ordered is null
select dividedid from divided where ordered is null
mapper.update: update divided SET ifDivided = #{param1} where dividedId = #{param2}
update divided set score1 = #{score1} where dividedid =#{dividedid}
update divided set score2 = #{score2} where dividedid =#{dividedid}
update divided set ordered = #{ordered} where dividedid = #{dividedid}
